definition: of very poor quality, the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on, to ask for and get free
details:
adjective
- of very poor quality
= synonyms: cheap
noun
- the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
= synonyms: tail
- person who does no work
= example: person who does no work
= synonyms: idler, loafer, do-nothing, layabout
- a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible
= synonyms: stinkpot
- a disreputable vagrant
= synonyms: tramp
verb
- to ask for and get free
= example: to ask for and get free
= synonyms: sponge
- to be lazy or idle
= example: to be lazy or idle
= synonyms: arse around, fuck off, bum around, bum about, arse about, frig around, waste one's time, lounge around, loll, loll around, lounge about, loaf
